attributes.action: Extend the dates for people on maternity/new mothers for free dental treatment
attributes.additional_details: New mothers have not had the chance to use the dentist with lockdown, this is just one of the multiple things that new parents and people on maternity have missed out on already so would be nice to have the dental treatment extended so we can attend for a routine appointment after lockdown
attributes.background: I would like the chance to help change the deadline of free dental treatment for mothers until the child is one, as we are unable to book routine appointments with lockdown I feel it would be beneficial to extend it another 6 month to a year.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576570
